choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.

### Response:


Sure, here's a sample healthy meal plan for you for today:

Breakfast: 1 cup of oatmeal with 1 banana and 1/2 cup of blueberries. You can also add some almond milk to make it creamy.

Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, and a vinaigrette dressing.

Dinner: Baked salmon with roasted sweet potatoes, steamed broccoli, and a side of quinoa. You can also add some lemon juice and garlic to the salmon for extra flavor.

Snack: 1 medium-sized apple with almond butter on top.

Remember to always check the labels of packaged foods to ensure they are healthy and free from added sugars, salt, and unhealthy fats.
